1.paragraph: I enjoy building things, I've covered a lot of ground in terms of what and how I influence what gets built across several industries; from nanotechnology to ecommerce - as a researcher, product manager and various support roles.

2.paragraph: Currently, I'm transitioning from product to software engineering. While I loved strategic aspects of Product such as creating a vision and articulating a roadmap, I realized I would rather focus my day to day energy on building things and getting my hands dirty.

3.paragraph: As a Software Engineer I will bring with me a deep curiosity to understand customer needs and business challenges that I've been immersed in as a Product Manager over the past few years.
